selected_articles.title: Top 10 Tourist Attractions to Visit in Kenya
selected_articles.snippet: Kenya is a country with a rich history, diverse culture, and breathtaking natural beauty. From the majestic Mount Kenya to the beautiful beaches along the Indian Ocean, there are plenty of tourist attractions to visit in Kenya.

selected_articles.title: 10 Must-Visit Places in Kenya for an Unforgettable Experience
selected_articles.snippet: From the savannas of Nairobi National Park to the majestic Mount Kilimanjaro, Kenya has a wealth of attractions that showcase its natural beauty, rich culture, and vibrant city life.

selected_articles.title: Kenya's Top 10 Tourist Destinations You Should Visit
selected_articles.snippet: Kenya is a country with a diverse range of tourist attractions, from wildlife reserves to beautiful beaches and vibrant city life. Here are the top 10 tourist destinations you should visit.
